recipe1.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
In a large skillet, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned.
Add onion and garlic and cook until softened.
Add crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Simmer for 10-15 minutes.
Serve sauce over spaghetti.

recipe2.name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, chicken broth, cornstarch, and sesame oil.
In a wok or large skillet, heat vegetable oil over high heat.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Add broccoli, bell pepper, onion, and garlic and stir fry for 5-7 minutes.
Pour soy sauce mixture over stir fry and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
Serve over rice.

recipe3.name: Beef Stew
instructions: In a large pot, brown beef stew meat over medium heat.
Add onions and garlic and cook until softened.
Add carrots, potatoes, diced tomatoes, beef broth, bay leaves, thyme, salt, and pepper.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 1-2 hours.
Serve hot.

recipe4.name: Roasted Chicken
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F.
Rinse chicken and pat dry.
Place lemon slices and minced garlic inside the chicken cavity.
Rub olive oil, thyme, salt, and pepper over the chicken.
Place chicken in a roasting pan and roast for 1-1/2 to 2 hours, or until the internal temperature of the chicken reaches 165°F.
Let the chicken rest for

recipe5.name: Beef Tacos
ingredients: Toppings: shredded cheese, diced tomato, lettuce, salsa, sour cream
instructions: In a large skillet, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned.
Add onion and garlic and cook until softened.
Add chili powder, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Simmer for 10-15 minutes.
Serve beef mixture in corn tortillas with desired toppings.

recipe6.name: Vegetable Curry
instructions: In a large pot, heat vegetable oil over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic and cook until softened.
Add curry powder, cumin, coriander, and cayenne pepper and cook for another minute.
Add potatoes, carrots, chickpeas, diced tomatoes, vegetable broth, and coconut milk.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20-30 minutes, or until vegetables are tender.
Serve hot over rice.

recipe7.name: Lentil Soup
ingredients: 1 cup dried lentils, rinsed and drained
instructions: In a large pot, sauté onion and garlic over medium heat until softened.
Add carrots and celery and cook for another 5-7 minutes.
Add lentils, vegetable broth, diced tomatoes, thyme, salt, and pepper.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30-45 minutes, or until lentils are tender.
Serve hot.

recipe8.name: Pesto Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions.
Drain pasta and return it to the pot.
Add basil pesto and cherry tomatoes to the pot and stir to combine.
Serve hot, topped with grated Parmesan cheese.
